resources.string: Tribune Zamaneh is a secure news reader and reporter app featuring group conversations around news.
The stories shared with you using Tribune Zamaneh Nearby are listed here.

Tor is an open network that helps keep you safe online. It defends against network surveillance that threatens your personal freedom and privacy. You will use the Orbot app to connect to the Tor network.
Tap the panic button to delete your personal data within Tribune Zamaneh. You can set the panic action to delete the entire app in your settings.
Share stories, feeds and the entire app using Tribune Zamaneh Nearby. It\'s safe, easy and only requires a friend nearby with Bluetooth. App sharing requires a WiFi network or hotspot.
Chat with the Tribune Zamaneh community using Tribune Zamaneh Talk.

Tips to reduce your data consumption:

1. Sync only the feeds that matter to you most. Tribune Zamaneh allows you to sync individual feeds.

2. Choose Bit Wise syncing mode in your settings. This syncs only text, with the ability to load photos on a story by story basis.

3. Expire your articles in a timely manner. Choose your time frame in your settings.
Passwords do not match, please try again
Share the news thatâ€™s happening around you

Tribune Zamaneh provides a feed of noteworthy news to its community. Every post created with Tribune Zamaneh will undergo a curation process before it is shared in the official Tribune Zamaneh news feed. Please see the Terms & Conditions ("About Tribune Zamaneh" then "Terms & Software Licenses) to understand the rights you grant when you share information with Tribune Zamaneh.
To share the Tribune Zamaneh app or the apps supported by it (Orbot and ChatSecure) with people nearby, please take the following steps:
Your friend must have the Tribune Zamaneh app open to the \'Receive a Share\' screen from the side menu.
Receive a story from a friend using Tribune Zamaneh Nearby.
Your post is empty. Would you like to delete it?
Describe what\'s happening in the photo above. Include important details about the location and subject, but remember to respect others\' privacy.
You need to specify at least a photo and a title!
Your nickname will be used in group conversations and will be displayed with the reports you publish.
Saved less than a minute ago
In order to continue you need to login to your account
Register an account in order to continue. Registration confirmation will be emailed to you.
Account created. You will receive an email from where you can set your password.
Failed to contact server. Please make sure you have Internet connectivity!
Wrong username or password, please try again!
Username or email already registered, please choose another one.
Already have an account? Login here.
I give my permission to use my content
Commenting Failed, Proxy Required for Commenting

Since 2007, Radio Zamaneh has focused particularly on increasing public awareness on democracy and human rights in Iran. We strive for an informed, educated and empowered civil society that can act as a catalyst for change and reform and put an end to increasing violations of basic human rights in Iran.
